actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for the replacement of lock and dam 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois, and Missouri.

summary.text: Modifies the project authorizing the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to replace a certain dam and locks on the Mississippi River, Illinois and Missouri. Repeals specified authority of the Secretary concerning the Upper Mississippi River System.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the replacement of lock and dam 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois, and Missouri.
